name: __EWeightMapTargetCommon
doc: The possible targets for a physical mesh point weight map.

BackstopDistance: The distance that each vertex can move away from its reference (skinned) position
BackstopRadius: Distance along the plane of the surface that the particles can travel (separation constraint)
AnimDriveStiffness: Radius of movement to allow for backstop movement
AnimDriveDamping_DEPRECATED: Strength of anim drive per-particle (spring driving particle back to skinned location
